djangotailoring.surveys.models¶

Generally, you will not have to deal with the model classes in this module directly. The class is used by djangotailoring.surveys.views.base.BaseSurveyView as part of its state management system.

Models¶

class djangotailoring.surveys.models.SurveyState¶

Encapsulates all of the data necessary to rebuild where a user was in a survey at a given point in time. SurveyState objects should be created before a user has access to the associated page.

user_id¶

A string that represents a unique user ID. The ID can be anything, as long as it is the same as that used by the tailoring views for their subject id.

survey_id¶

A string that identifies the survey that the state belongs to.

page_msgid¶

A string that uniquely identifies which page this state belongs to. This is an MTS Message ID found somewhere within one and only one page.

running_subject_data¶

A dictionary of characteristic names mapped to values. The dictionary is a union of all answers given by the in the survey for this state, and all previous states.

latest_page_data¶

A dictionary of characteristic names mapped to values. The dictionary is a set of responses given at the most recent submission to the page.

validation_errors¶

A count of the number of times the user has submitted invalid data to this page.

previous_state¶

A reference to another SurveyState, identifying which state comes before it in a user’s path of the survey. If it is None, it is assumed to be the starting state.

valid¶

A boolean indicating whether the current state should be considered valid when searching for a page’s data.

created¶

The time when the state was first created.

modified¶

The time when the state was most recently changed.

invalidate_descendents(self)¶

Find all SurveyStates that include this state as an ancestor, and set their valid attribute to False, and do the same for each state’s progeny as well.

rebuild_running_subject_data(self)¶
Return type:a dictionary
Returns:a dictionary of Characteristic names mapped to values.

Dig through all of this state’s ancestors and build a dictionary of their values.

current_subject_data(self)¶
Return type:a dictionary
Returns:a dictionary of Characteristic names mapped to values.

A convenience method for overlaying the latest_page_data on top of running_subject_data.
